subject: Re: Duracube Sliding Banner revised artwork
preview: Hi Ben, Confirming the changes have been implemented: https://duracube.com.au/Noted, we are standing by for the next discussion.

full_threads.body:
Hi Ben, 

Confirming the changes have been implemented: https://duracube.com.au/

Noted, we are standing by for the next discussion.
Hi @joel, we have a green light to apply the header updates to the live homepage.

Thanks Chris

Go ahead and implement these.

We would like to discuss making these more dynamic in the future so they adjust accordingly to your screen size so you can always see the bottom banner, but this is a project I will leave to the new marketing manager to discuss with you.

Kind Regards,

Ben Simpson
General Manager



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



0448 053 033



ben.simpson@duracube.com.au

Hi Ben,

All set in with the height adjustment, here is the link: https://duracube.com.au/home-clone

@chris Sure, the slider height has been updated from 700 to 560px

+5mins THanks!

@joel, can you please adjust the header height to be 20% smaller? 
Link: https://duracube.com.au/home-clone/

Yes 20% would be good I think

Ben Simpson
General Manager
0448 053 033

Duracube

Hi Ben, 

The button link has been corrected. 

In terms of height, how much did you want to reduce the size of the banner by? e.g. 20% reduction.

Hello Chris,

I have checked this out and images in general look ok and fine to go live however the "Download Revit Files" button dosen't work.

Also did Belinda discuss with you about reducing the height of this sliding banner?

Kind Regards,

Ben Simpson
General Manager



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



0448 053 033



ben.simpson@duracube.com.au

Ben Simpson

Once approved, we'll apply the changes to the actual home page.

action.text: Chris Paradowski changed the customer to Ben Simpson

full_threads.body:
@chris All good on this one. +1.5hrs

https://duracube.com.au/home-clone/

Hi @joel, I have clarification from the client on these updates. 

Page: https://duracube.com.au/home-clone/

General: heading on Hero Banner to be a H2. 

Slider 1
1. H2 text: "Revit BIM Models for wet areas
2. Move H1 and button up 1x line height. 
3. Button text: does not match button styling in header, please adjust. 

Slider 2 - image https://duracube.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/artboard-42x-100-scaled.jpg
1. H2 text: "Specialist in wet area solutions"
2. Button text: "VIEW OUR PRODUCTS"
3. Button link: https://duracube.com.au/products/

Slider 3 - image: https://duracube.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/artboard-62x-100-scaled.jpg
1. H2 text: "Toilet Partitions"
2. Button text: "VIEW OUR PRODUCTS"
3. Button link: https://duracube.com.au/partitioning-systems/

Slider 4 - https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/8p23ec37euoqxdn5doy1d/Website-Sliding-Banner-Dur-asafe-Colours-Background.pdf?rlkey=r3jc833st7vxa723gp5l1hwd3&dl=0
1. H2 text: "New Durasafe® colours available April 2024" (please see mock up PDF)
2. Button text: VIEW COLOURS 
3. Buttong link: https://duracube.com.au/colours/

Let me know if you'd like to jump on a call to go through.

attachments.filename: Website Sliding Banner ? Dur asafe Colours Background.jpg

full_threads.body:
Hi @joel,

The assets are here: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/hhzb39cg87wvyakgfzim5/h?rlkey=0w75yba2yh1yfrsd8xeiv7qn5&dl=0
The updates are to be made to this page: https://duracube.com.au/?page_id=6007&preview=true

Background:
Heath created a draft home page for client approval, the below are revisions/updates.

+15 mins Heath created draft and sent to client.

Hi Chris,

I have just sent you the files for the Duracube website sliding banner for the homepage.

Slide order:
1. First Banner is for Revit files for download (3 options sent – not sure what is the best layout)
2. Second Banner – Specialists in wet area solutions
3. Third Banner – Durasafe Compact Laminate Seven New Colours
4. Fourth Banner – Made in Australia
5. Fifth Banner – Durasafe Compact Laminate Download Brochure

Sent files include:
• PDF showing the combined artwork
• Background images in PDF format (Do you need the background images supplied in PNG or JPEG format?)
• Elements for the top of the background images in PDF and PNG format

Please let me know:
• If you need elements or text supplied in a different format
• If you have any recommendations regarding improving text or images and layout

Question's
1. Can the carousel loop continuously with a smooth, subtle, fading transition between each slide?
2. Can the text, Revit logo and Duracube brochure graphic slide in or would that be distracting.
3. Do you think the H1 text – Toilet Partitioning Company in Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide & Brisbane – is better below the sliding banner or above the sliding banner, reversed on the blue background as shown in the original mock-up?
4. The developers can create the buttons for the links to the other pages.
Is linking to the brochure and colour page from the sliding banner recommended or is this outdated?

Note: The arrows on the sliding banner look good instead of the dotts.

Please contact me if you need clarification on the above information.

Kind Regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist


13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750

1300 387 228 <tel:1300387228>

belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au <mailto:belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au>


<https://app.signite.io/assets/9b1a282e-0093-44ec-9646-3d974b4304e8/url>
